With his loyal penguin companion, Pipi, he sets sail across the vibrant Nusantara archipelago in hopes of striking it rich and finally feasting like kings. Along the way, they face wild storms, comical misadventures, and a major misunderstanding when theyâ€™re mistaken for invading colonizers by Kemboja, a spirited local chef. Tied to a coconut tree and grilled with questions, Penkin manages to explain their true intentions. Gaining Kemboja's trust and appetite for adventure the trio ventures into the heart of the island's mysterious forest, where the real journey begins
